thread.title: Judith
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Judith

author: Judith
title: Judith
text: It's hard to give adult children Birthday and other holiday gifts that they can use and like. Recently, I used Bake A Wish products twice. In the first instance, I sent my adult son a sheet cake of, what I call super duper chocolate. He loved it. It was his favorite. Next I was having a large party and remembered Bake A Wish. I supplemented my menu with their quiches (scrumptious) and their desserts -- the chocolate mousse cake and the New York Cheesecake. Both were big hits. I highly recommend Bake A Wish for any of their bakery and gourmet products.
